kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
@liamgold good idea!
I heard from the techincal writing team that updates are in the works for that page now that there are quite a few more guides than when it was originally created.
I'll mention this suggestion 👍.
Edit ---
The icons _do_ have meanings, but the definitions aren't listed anywhere, so they're _de facto internal_ right now. The team will be updating the [Quickstart guides landing page](https://docs.xperience.io/tutorial/quickstart-guides) with an overview and explanations of the icons.
